違犯: (いぼん) - offense (against the law); offence; violation
違犯行為: (いはんこうい) - violation; offense; offence
違約金: (いやくきん) - penalty for contract breach
違約金条項: (いやくきんじょうこう) - penalty clause; breach of contract clause
違警罪: (いけいざい) - (relatively minor) offense against police regulations (offence)
遙々: (はるばる) - from afar; over a great distance; all the way
遙か: (はるか) - far; far away; distant; remote; far off
遙かに: (はるかに) - far off; in the distance; long ago; far; by far; far and away
遙遙: (はるばる) - from afar; over a great distance; all the way
遜る: (へりくだる) - to deprecate oneself and praise the listener; to abase oneself
遜色がある: (そんしょくがある) - to be inferior to; to suffer by comparison with (something)
遜色がない: (そんしょくがない) - bears comparison with (something); compares favorably with (something); compares favourably with (something); isn't inferior to (something)
遜色のない: (そんしょくのない) - favourably comparing
遠々しい: (とおどおしい) - distant (behavior, etc.); reserved
遠い: (tooi) - far, distant, far away, a long way off, in the distance; distant (past), remote (in time), remote, far-removed (in time) , far, distant, far away, a long way off, in the distance; distant (past), remote (in time), remote, far-removed (in time); distant (relationship or kinship), having little to do (com alguém); far (from something else in quality, degree, etc.), not similar, way off
遠い目: (とおいめ) - distant look; faraway look
遠からず: (とおからず) - soon; in the near future
遠きは花の香近きは糞の香: (とおきははなのかちかきはくそのか) - it's human nature to consider things that are afar as beautiful and things that are up close as unsightly
遠く: (tooku) - longe, distante, à distância, lugar distante, de longe
遠くに霞む: (とおくにかすむ) - to loom in the distance
遠くの親類より近くの他人: (とおくのしんるいよりちかくのたにん) - A neighbour is better than a relative living far
遠く及ばない: (とおくおよばない) - falling far short of; no equal (match) for
遠く離れて: (とおくはなれて) - at a long distance
遠ざかる: (とおざかる) - to go away/to become more distant/to fade away/to die away; to be estranged
遠ざける: (とおざける) - to keep away; to keep at a distance
遠っ走り: (とおっぱしり) - going a long way
遠のく: (とおのく) - to become distant; to recede
遠のける: (とおのける) - to keep (someone) at a distance
遠の昔: (とうのむかし) - a long time ago
遠交近攻: (えんこうきんこう) - (yoji) policy of cultivating distant countries while working to conquer those nearby
遠侍: (とおさぶらい) - guard house in a samurai style house (Kamakura period)
遠国: (おんごく) - distant land; remote country
遠山里: (とおやまざと) - remote mountain village
遠島: (おんとう) - (えんとう, とおじま only) remote island/distant island; (えんとう, おんとう only) punishment by exile to a remote island
遠州行灯: (えんしゅうあんどん) - Enshu lantern; type of paper lantern
遠巻き: (とおまき) - surrounding at a distance
遠征: (ensei) - expedition, (military) campaign; tour (por um time esportivo, artista, etc.), visit
遠心分離機: (えんしんぶんりき) - centrifuge; centrifugal machine
遠心分離法: (えんしんぶんりほう) - centrifugal separation method; centrifuge process; centrifugation method
遠心性神経: (えんしんせいしんけい) - efferent neuron; efferent nerve; efferent
遠心鋳造: (えんしんちゅうぞう) - centrifugal casting
遠忌: (えんき) - 13th or later anniversary of a death
遠慮: (enryo) - reserva, restrição, contenção, modéstia, timidez, hesitação, contenção de si, discrição, tato, consideração; recusar, abster-se, reserva, restrição, contenção, modéstia, timidez, hesitação, contenção de si, discrição, tato, consideração; recusar, abster-se; previdência, previsibilidade
遠慮がち: (えんりょがち) - shy; diffident; retiring; reserved
遠慮なく: (えんりょなく) - without reservation; freely; frankly
遠慮会釈: (えんりょえしゃく) - (yoji) reserve and consideration (to others)
遠慮会釈もない: (えんりょえしゃくもない) - (often as 遠慮会釈もなく)  inconsiderate; ruthless; merciless; lacking compunction
遠慮会釈も無い: (えんりょえしゃくもない) - (often as 遠慮会釈もなく)  inconsiderate; ruthless; merciless; lacking compunction
遠慮勝ち: (えんりょがち) - shy; diffident; retiring; reserved
遠慮気味: (えんりょぎみ) - (yoji) somewhat reserved (diffident); shyly; timidly; retiringly; in a retiring (reserved) manner
遠慮近憂: (えんりょきんゆう) - (yoji) Failure to think of the long term leads to grief in the short term
遠方: (おちかた) - long way; distant place
遠景: (えんけい) - vista; background; perspective; distant view
遠来: (えんらい) - foreign or distant visitor
遠洋漁業: (えんようぎょぎょう) - deep-sea fisheries
遠洋航海: (えんようこうかい) - ocean navigation
